co.cask.cdap.api.data.format

Class RecordFormat<FROM,TO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.api.data.format.RecordFormat<FROM,TO>
  • Type Parameters:
    FROM - the raw data to read from.
    TO - object to format the data into.

    @Beta
public abstract class RecordFormat<FROM,TO>
extends Object
    Interface specifying how to read data in some format into java objects. A format implies at least a default schema, which may be as simple as a byte array.

        protected Schema schema

    • Constructor Detail

        public RecordFormat()

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public abstract TO read(FROM input)
                 throws UnexpectedFormatException
        Read data from the input format to the output type.
        Parameters:
        input - input object to read.
        Returns:
        formatted input.
        Throws:
        UnexpectedFormatException - if the input object could not be read because it is of an unexpected format.

      • getDefaultSchema

        protected abstract Schema getDefaultSchema()
        Get the default schema for the format. The default is used if no schema is provided in the call to initialize(FormatSpecification). Should return null if there is no default schema, meaning a schema must be provided during initialization of the format.
        Returns:
        the default schema for the format, or null if a schema must be provided to the format

      • validateSchema

        protected abstract void validateSchema(Schema schema)
                                throws UnsupportedTypeException
        Validate the given schema, throwing an exception if it is unsupported. It can be assumed that the input schema is not null and is a record of at least one field.
        Parameters:
        schema - the schema to validate for the format
        Throws:
        UnsupportedTypeException - if the schema not supported

      • initialize

        public void initialize(FormatSpecification formatSpecification)
                throws UnsupportedTypeException
        Initialize the format with the given desired schema and properties. Guaranteed to be called once before any other method is called.
        Parameters:
        formatSpecification - the specification for the format, containing the desired schema and settings
        Throws:
        UnsupportedTypeException - if the desired schema and properties are not supported

      • configure

        protected void configure(Map<String,String> settings)
        Configure the format with the given properties. Guaranteed to be called once before any call to read(Object) is made, and after a schema for the format has been set.
        Parameters:
        settings - the settings to configure the format with

      • getSchema

        public Schema getSchema()
        Get the schema of the format.
        Returns:
        the schema of the format.
